===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=えのきたけ|榎|tr1=enoki|t1={{l|en|Chinese hackberry}} {{l|en|tree}}|茸|tr2=take|t2={{l|en|mushroom}}}},<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> as this mushroom can often be found growing on the Chinese hackberry tree.
